messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: essay/article on unschooling needed for magazine!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/1/03 1:28:35 PM, shantris2000@yahoo.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/1/03 1:28:35 PM, shantris2000@... writes:

<< Sandra, thank you so much for your generous offer! Your column is

always the very first one I leap to when I get HEM! :) >>

Thanks.

There are a few there that weren't in HEM, just local (or other local)
things.

All Kinds of Homeschooling

Moving a Puddle (it's online at unschooling.com, but before that it was in
Enchanted Families and F.U.N. News)

Tiny Monsters (I don't think was ever in HEM)

Art, Aging and Spirituality (Holly and the Hippie Shirt)

Magical Thinking and Spoiled Children

Rejecting a Pre-Packaged Life


I think those are the only-published-regionally set, though a few were
published three times or four, in various local-groups' newsletters.

messages.subject: Re: essay/article on unschooling needed for magazine!
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra, thank you so much for your generous offer! Your column is always the very first one I leap to when I get HEM! :) I ll let you know if I decide to
messages.messageBody:
Sandra, thank you so much for your generous offer! Your column is
always the very first one I leap to when I get HEM! :)

I'll let you know if I decide to reprint one of your articles...and
of course you'd receive a free copy of the issue!

Thanks again!!
Keara

I hope you get something quick, original and brilliant though from some of
the really good writers here!

Sandra

messages.subject: essay/article on unschooling needed for magazine!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi there! An article that I had lined up for the next issue of Pandora s Box Magazine has fallen through, and I need an unschooling article or essay pretty
messages.messageBody:
Hi there! An article that I had lined up for the next issue of
Pandora's Box Magazine has fallen through, and I need an unschooling
article or essay pretty soon.

If anyone is interested, please email me at
editor@... for more information.

Thank you!
Keara Shanahan, Editor/Publisher
Pandora's Box Magazine http://www.pandorasboxmag.com
Join the Neighborhood!
http://www.pandorasboxmag.com/neighborhood.html
